items.sentence: I\'ve read all of these books several times each.
Would you like me to help you with your homework?
Would you like me to turn on the air conditioner?
Tom thought he\'d found the perfect hiding place.
I didn\'t notice that Tom was sitting by himself.
I didn\'t realize Tom was the one who broke that.
Tom didn\'t know where the fire extinguisher was.
I\'m not used to getting up early in the morning.
Tom told everyone that he was tempted to do that.
Tom told his children to quit jumping on the bed.
